thread.section_title: Hotel Dei Borgognoni - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location intimate attractive hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent location intimate attractive hotel - Review of Hotel Dei Borgognoni, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: byrondevotee
title: Excellent location intimate attractive hotel
text: This hotel was in a fabulous location as we could walk to most attractions. The hotel was charming and attractive. We had a lovely quiet room that looked onto and internal courtyard. The breakfast food was lovely and I would definitely visit here again.
